missed_differentials.reasoning: Patient's symptoms of fatigue, lightheadedness, and palpitations could be indicative of an underlying anxiety or depression disorder.
Patient's symptoms of cough, chest pain, and shortness of breath could be indicative of COPD.

guideline_checks.plan_item: Increase Lasix dose to 80 mg daily
Instruct patient to weigh himself every day and call if gaining more weight

safety_checks.description: Potential interaction between Lasix and Lisinopril (both diuretics)
Dosing within normal ranges for Lasix and Lisinopril
